com.skype
Class ChatMessage

java.lang.Object
  com.skype.ChatMessage

public final class ChatMessage
extends java.lang.Object

This class implements Skype CHATMESSAGE object.

See Also:
Protocol 3. Supersedes the MESSAGE object.
